sectionTitle: Technical expertise to scale your business
sectionDescription: From concept to deploy, we offer the full development cycle with cutting-edge technologies and focus on user experience.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Native or hybrid iOS and Android apps (React Native/Flutter) with flawless performance.

web.title: Web Applications
web.description: Complex web systems, Dashboards, and SPAs using React, Next.js and modern technologies.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Intuitive, user-centered interfaces. High-fidelity prototyping and design systems.

backend.title: Backend & API
backend.description: Robust architectures, microservices, and scalable APIs with Node.js, Python, or Go.

qa.title: QA & Testing
qa.description: Quality assurance with automated and manual testing to deliver bug-free software.

consulting.title: Tech Consulting
consulting.description: Technical feasibility analysis, software architecture, and digital transformation.
